
## Simple K-means clustering function 

### Usages 

```
cd simple-kmeans
$ python kmeans-clustering.py 3 test_data/test.csv 50

```
### Results:

Centroids.csv
```text
          x         y
0  0.745314  0.722009
1  0.708548  0.183850
2  0.259475  0.456805
```
